ussr.robotbuildingblocks
Interface Robot

All Known Implementing Classes:
ATRON, ConveyorSimulation.ConveyorATRON, MTRAN, Odin, OdinBall, OdinBattery, OdinHinge, OdinMuscle, OdinSpring, OdinWheel
public interface Robot

An abstract description of what a robot is: a description of the hardware and an implementation of a controller.

Author:
ups

Method Summary
 Controller createController()
          Create a new controller object that can be associated with the robot hardware description by getDescription
 RobotDescription getDescription()
          Get a description of the hardware (physical characteristics) of the robot
 

Method Detail

getDescription

RobotDescription getDescription()
Get a description of the hardware (physical characteristics) of the robot

Returns:
a description of the robot hardware

createController

Controller createController()
Create a new controller object that can be associated with the robot hardware description by getDescription

Returns:
a newly created controller object
